thread.title: Why a Trump-Led Antitrust Case Against Amazon Is a Long Shot

author: Laura Stevens
title: Why a Trump-Led Antitrust Case Against Amazon Is a Long Shot
text:
President Donald Trumpâ€™s tweets against Amazon.com Inc. have renewed investor concerns about the prospect of antitrust action being brought against the online retail giant.
But targeting Amazon on anticompetition grounds would be difficult, requiring an overturn of the principles that have guided U.S. antitrust enforcement for decades, policy experts say.

On... RELATED VIDEO Is Amazon Going to Rule the World? Amazon wants to deliver everything you want to your doorstep, anywhere in the world. But the e-commerce giant faces several challenges in its pursuit of a global empire. WSJ's Karan Deep Singh breaks down the basics with the help of an Amazon delivery box.
